titles.title: Modernizing American Manufacturing Bonds Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify certain rules applicable to qualified small issue manufacturing bonds.
Modernizing American Manufacturing Bonds Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Modernizing American Manufacturing Bonds Act
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to qualified small issue bonds for manufacturing purposes, to: (1) expand the definition of "manufacturing facility" to include a facility which is used in the creation or production of intangible property and which is functionally related and subordinate to a facility located on the same site and financed with not more than 25% of bond proceeds, and (2) increase from $10 million to $30 million the maximum bond limitation.
